ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(StageName),'Execute (Start Delivery)') && ISCHANGED(StageName ) && ISPICKVAL(StageName ,'Handover (Prepare for Delivery)') && $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator' && $Profile.Name <> 'Data Loader Profile' && $Profile.Name <> 'Global Process Admin Profile'
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have sufficient authority to do so, please contact the system administrator or Global Process administrator
